HeroSection.title: Fan Al-Mazallat.. Where Luxury Meets Solid Protection
HeroSection.subtitle: We provide modern shading solutions and smart screens designed for Saudi Arabia's climate. Precision engineering, up to 10-year warranty, and competitive prices in Jeddah.

AboutSection.title: Who We Are
AboutSection.subtitle: Fan Al-Mazallat
AboutSection.paragraph1: At Fan Al-Mazallat, we don't just install iron and fabric; we create outdoor environments that protect and inspire you. We launched with a vision to change the traditional concept of metalwork, replacing randomness with engineering precision, and repetitive designs with modern artistic touches that keep pace with the Kingdom's urban renaissance.
AboutSection.paragraph2: Our team consists of professional engineers and technicians who ensure safe, clean, and fast installation. We use the best Korean and German materials to guarantee quality that lasts for years.

ServicesSection.title: Our Services
ServicesSection.subtitle: We provide comprehensive shading solutions for all your needs

carShades.title: Car Shades
carShades.description: Protect your car from sun, rain, and dust with high-quality shades. Hanging shades without front pillars for complete freedom.

screens.title: Privacy Screens
screens.description: Complete privacy for your garden and pool. Iron, wood, and lexan screens with modern and durable designs.

pergolas.title: Pergolas
pergolas.description: Transform your roof or garden into a private resort. Wooden and iron pergolas with modern touches.

hangars.title: Hangars
hangars.description: Comprehensive industrial solutions. Shinko and sandwich panel hangars with civil defense specifications and superior thermal insulation.

ProjectsSection.title: Our Portfolio
ProjectsSection.subtitle: We're proud of our achievements - View some of our featured projects

WhyUsSection.title: Why Choose Fan Al-Mazallat?
WhyUsSection.subtitle: We stand out with quality, commitment, and transparency in every project

materials.title: Certified Materials
materials.description: We only use original materials - genuine 1100 gram PVC, SABIC iron with specification-compliant thicknesses.

supervision.title: Engineering Supervision
supervision.description: Every project is supervised by a specialized supervisor to ensure structural safety and excellent execution.

speed.title: Speed & Cleanliness
speed.description: We commit to delivery times and leave the work site cleaner than it was.

pricing.title: Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: No hidden costs. We provide you with detailed pricing per meter and specifications before starting.

FAQSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQSection.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions from our customers

difference.question: What's the difference between slat screens and braided screens?
difference.answer: Slat screens block visibility and air at 100% providing maximum privacy, while braided screens allow slight air passage (15-20%) making them more resistant to strong winds with a distinctive aesthetic appearance.

guarantee.question: Do you offer warranty on shades?
guarantee.answer: Yes, we offer warranty starting from 5 years and up to 10 years on some types of PVC and ironwork against manufacturing and installation defects.

fabricVsSheets.question: Which is better for car shade, fabric or shinko?
fabricVsSheets.answer: Fabric (PVC) looks better, doesn't make noise in rain, and provides excellent thermal insulation. Shinko is a practical and economical option but less aesthetic. We recommend PVC for homes.

pricing.question: What is your shade price per meter?
pricing.answer: PVC shade prices start from 90 SAR per meter for standard specifications, varying based on fabric type (Korean/German) and installation method. Contact us for an accurate quote.

ContactSection.subtitle: We're here to help. Contact us now for a free consultation
